Character_1.Name: Pikachu
Character_1.Character_Summary: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its speed and electric attacks. It is agile and can deliver powerful electric shocks, but it is vulnerable to Ground-type moves.

Move_1.Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

Move_2.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.

Move_3.Description: The user attacks with a hard tail.

Move_4.Description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target.

Character_2.Name: Charizard
Character_2.Character_Summary: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon known for its fiery breath and ability to fly. It can unleash powerful fire attacks but is weak to Water and Rock-type moves.

Move_1.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

Move_2.Description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

Move_3.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air.

Move_4.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire.
